comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Alte Fotos privat, Familie ,Freizeit und Urlaub,, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Tolle Mode für Arbeitskleidung...:-))

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called FrigateRN's Pictures of Interest., and we'd love to have this added to the group! These old Welsh pictures are just so full of character I think that it is a privilege to bring them to life again, even if just for a little while.
